snippet: Companies are finding that their greatest cybersecurity threats can hide in third-party systems, like networked air-conditioning equipment.
abstract: Companies are finding that their greatest cybersecurity threats can hide in countless third-party remote access corporate systems, where hackers can attack them; access comes through software controlling all kinds of services company needs, like networked air conditioning equipment and even vending machines.
lead_paragraph: Companies are finding that their greatest cybersecurity threats can hide in third-party systems, like networked air-conditioning equipment.

headline.main: Hackers Lurking in Vents and Soda Machines
headline.print_headline: Hackers Lurking in Vents and Soda Machines
